headingElement.name: headingElement

singleExpansion.description: Flag indicating if single expansion is enabled.

hideCurrent.name: hideCurrent
hideCurrent.description:
Indicate if the current page should not be present in the collection returned by
{@link #getItems()}.

showHidden.name: showHidden
showHidden.description: Indicate if pages that are hidden for navigation will still be displayed.

startLevel.name: startLevel
startLevel.description:

returned by {@link #getItems()} will be accumulated.

autopauseDisabled.description: Indicates whether automatic pause on hovering the carousel is disabled, or not.

autoplay.description: Indicates whether to automatically transition between slides, or not.

delay.description: Indicates the delay (in milliseconds) when automatically transitioning between slides.

titleFromAsset.description: Whether or not the title value is taken from the configured asset.

Name of the resource / configuration policy property that defines the navigation root from which to build the global
